name: Pigs and Pirates
description:
Overview

Pigs & Pirates is a pixel-art arcade game made in three days for the ZenoJam Game Jam. Avoid rocks and kill pirates with your lance for as long as possible. If you have two pirates on your lance, you can't use it until you put it away first.

Controls

D - Accelerate

A - Decelerate

Q - Spawn Lance

E - Despawn Lance

Space - Jump
